title: anyone else think the new champ should have horror music when hes chasing you down at low health?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfZr59XteDk
something like this 
it'd make him spooky at least

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Horro Music but with a deep-sea lovecraftian theme !
Like something out of Sunless Sea. The ultimate nautical horror soundtrack.
I think that's Warwick's thing, but it'd be cool depending on his mechanics
Jaws theme plays whenever fizz hits you with ult
no, that goes to Pool Party Rek'Sai
